plot: Mr. Pest tries several theatre seats before winding up in front in a fight with the conductor. He is thrown out. In the lobby he pushes a fat lady into a fountain and returns to sit down by Edna. Mr. Rowdy, in the gallery, pours beer down on Mr. Pest and Edna. He attacks patrons, a harem dancer, the singers Dot and Dash, and a fire-eater.   Written by  Ed Stephan
title: Charlot en el teatro.

cast.role: Lady in the Stalls with Beads
cast.name: Edna Purviance
